wikitext.*:
'''Oghor-hai''' was the name used by the [[Orcs]] to describe that race of [[Men]] otherwise known as the [[Drúedain]] or [[Woses]]. They were believed by the Orcs to possess [[magic]]al powers, and they therefore feared the Oghor-hai greatly.<ref>{{UT|Druedain}}</ref>
==Etymology==

''oghor'' + ''[[hai]]''
